title: TimeoutError
body:
```py
scitime.estimate.Estimator:DEBUG:The model would fit. Moving on
scitime.estimate.Estimator:DEBUG:Fetching estimator: RF_RandomForestRegressor_estimator.pkl
scitime.estimate.Estimator:INFO:Training your model for these params: {'total_memory': [17064296448], 'available_memory': [8100077568], 'num_cpu': [8], 'num_rows': [14803], 'num_features': [16298], 'n_estimators': [100], 'max_depth': [10], 'min_samples_split': [2], 'min_samples_leaf': [1], 'min_weight_fraction_leaf': [0.0], 'max_features': ['auto'], 'criterion': ['mse'], 'max_leaf_nodes': [None], 'min_impurity_decrease': [0.0], 'min_impurity_split': [None], 'bootstrap': [True], 'oob_score': [False], 'n_jobs': [8]}
scitime.estimate.Estimator:INFO:Transforming dataset for semi dummy features
scitime.estimate.Estimator:WARNING:Parameters ['warm_start', 'random_state', 'ccp_alpha', 'verbose', 'max_samples'] will not be accounted for

D:\Miniconda3\lib\site-packages\scitime\estimate.py in time(self, algo, X, y)
    444         try:
--> 445             self._fit_start(algo=algo, X=X, y=y)
    446 

D:\Miniconda3\lib\site-packages\scitime\_utils.py in wrapper(*args, **kwargs)
     48             if isinstance(ret, BaseException):
---> 49                 raise ret
     50             return ret

TimeoutError: artificial timeout error

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-9-f348ccfb0d86> in <module>
      1 estimator = Estimator(meta_algo='RF', verbose=3)
      2 model = RandomForestRegressor(random_state=1, max_depth=10, n_jobs=-1, verbose=2)
----> 3 estimation, lower_bound, upper_bound = estimator.time(model, dataset[:-1], dataset[1:])
      4 
      5 start_time = time.time()

D:\Miniconda3\lib\site-packages\scitime\estimate.py in time(self, algo, X, y)
    457                 if self.verbose >= 3:
    458                     self.logger.debug('The model would fit. Moving on')
--> 459                 return self._estimate(algo, X, y)

D:\Miniconda3\lib\site-packages\scitime\estimate.py in _estimate(self, algo, X, y)
    393             meta_X = self._transform_params(algo, df, scaled=True)
    394         else:
--> 395             meta_X = self._transform_params(algo, df)
    396 
    397         prediction = max(np.float64(0), meta_estimator.predict(meta_X)[0])

D:\Miniconda3\lib\site-packages\scitime\estimate.py in _transform_params(self, algo, df, scaled)
    281         meta_X = (df[estimation_inputs]
    282                   ._get_numeric_data()
--> 283                   .dropna(axis=0, how='any')
    284                   .as_matrix())
    285

   5138                 return self[name]
-> 5139             return object.__getattribute__(self, name)
```
